flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A brutal ramming attack
using out-thrust horns.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A brutal ramming attack
using out-thrust horns.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A brutal ramming
attack delivered
with a tough and
impressive horn.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
Utilizing its tough
and impressive
horn, the user
rams into the foe 
with no letup.
